title: Spanish-owned communications satellite ready for launch from Cape Canaveral
summary: A nearly five-ton satellite for the Spanish company Hispasat is ready for liftoff from Cape Canaveral Monday aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket, beginning a mission to provide in-flight internet and other communications services over the Americas and the Atlantic Ocean.

title: Weather delays SpaceX launch with Hispasat’s Amazonas Nexus
summary: SpaceX is set to launch a satellite aimed at providing communications for all of the Americas–including shipping corridors and Greenland. Due to weather, the Amazonas Nexus mission is now scheduled to launch on a Falcon 9 rocket from Space Launch Complex 40 (SLC-40) at the Cape Canaveral Space Force Station (CCSFS) on Monday, Feb. 6.
